name: Aderrasi-spirits
milkdrop_raw:
[preset00]
fRating=5.000000
fGammaAdj=1.000000
fDecay=0.990000
fVideoEchoZoom=1.000000
fVideoEchoAlpha=0.500000
nVideoEchoOrientation=2
nWaveMode=0
bAdditiveWaves=0
bWaveDots=1
bWaveThick=1
bModWaveAlphaByVolume=0
bMaximizeWaveColor=0
bTexWrap=1
bDarkenCenter=1
bRedBlueStereo=0
bBrighten=0
bDarken=0
bSolarize=0
bInvert=0
fWaveAlpha=0.699728
fWaveScale=0.090162
fWaveSmoothing=0.500000
fWaveParam=-0.320000
fModWaveAlphaStart=0.500000
fModWaveAlphaEnd=1.000000
fWarpAnimSpeed=0.608039
fWarpScale=100.000000
fZoomExponent=1.000000
fShader=0.000000
zoom=1.000000
rot=0.000000
cx=0.500000
cy=0.500000
dx=0.000010
dy=0.000010
warp=0.010000
sx=1.025187
sy=1.025188
wave_r=1.000000
wave_g=1.000000
wave_b=1.000000
wave_x=0.500000
wave_y=0.500000
ob_size=0.000000
ob_r=0.010000
ob_g=0.000000
ob_b=0.000000
ob_a=1.000000
ib_size=0.250000
ib_r=0.250000
ib_g=0.250000
ib_b=0.250000
ib_a=0.000000
nMotionVectorsX=6.400000
nMotionVectorsY=4.800006
mv_dx=0.000000
mv_dy=0.000000
mv_l=5.000000
mv_r=0.000000
mv_g=0.000000
mv_b=1.000000
mv_a=0.000000
per_frame_1=wave_mystery = wave_mystery + 0.01*cos(5*bass);
per_frame_2=wave_mystery = wave_mystery + 0.23*sin(treb);
per_frame_3=rot = rot + 0.04*sin(time*0.25);
per_frame_4=warp = 0;
per_pixel_1=rot = rot - 0.04*sin(rad)/2;
per_pixel_2=sx = sx + if(above(x,0.3), if(above(y,0.3), if(below(x,0.7), if(below(y,0.7), 0.02*sin(time), 0), 0), 0), 0);
per_pixel_3=sy = sy + if(above(x,0.3), if(above(y,0.3), if(below(x,0.7), if(below(y,0.7), 0.02*sin(time), 0), 0), 0), 0);
per_pixel_4=warp = warp + if (above(x,0.5 + 0.25*sin(time)), if(above(y, 0.5 + 0.25*sin(0.9*time)), if(below(x, 0.6 + 0.3*sin(1.1*time)), if(below(y, 0.6 + 0.3*sin(1.2*time)), +2, 0), 0), 0), 0);
